name: Crasher: Nirvana
description:
Crasher: Nirvana is a mobile MMORPG with martial arts-based theme. Here you can enjoy various wonderful gaming experience: open world exploration, smooth and cool real-time combat, unique outfit customization, meticulously designed gameplays.....all of these will bring you a mythical Wuxia experience. Come and start your journey in this fantasy realm!

【Immersive Open World】
Under the mode of open world, you can travel around a vast map and enjoy a breathtaking visual feast. A fantastic land is waiting for you to explore.

【Exclusive Outfit】
Plenty of costumes, pets, mounts, wings, weapons, capes and other exquisite appearance available to choose. Customize your characters and show your charm！

【Fantastic Combat】
Exciting PVP battles are waiting for you to challenge the ranking. Come and fight for your honor!

【Massive Battlefield】
Epic cross-server gameplay has started！Thousands of people collaborate to strike the powerful monsters together. All heroes gather to contend for the championship！
